pr_title: [C][Client][Clang Static Analyzer] Remove the useless variable when assembling URL

timeline.message: [C][Clang Static Analyzer] Remove the useless variable when assembling URL

timeline.bodyText:
@ityuhui Shall we still keep the condition and just remove slashNeedsToBeAppendedToBasePath = true;?
basePathLength is still used below.
timeline.author: wing328

replies.bodyText:
Hi @wing328
basePathLength should not be added 1 (basePathLength++) because we do not append a "/" to basePath actually, but anyway, it has no harm. Just will confuse people.
replies.author: ityuhui
